graphicslib

Class Picture

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphicslib.Picture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shape

    public class Picture
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape
    A picture from an image file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
